titles.title: Pregnancy Discrimination Amendment Act
To amend the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to provide protections against pregnancy discrimination in the workplace, and for other purposes.
Pregnancy Discrimination Amendment Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Pregnancy Discrimination Amendment Act
This bill expands protections against pregnancy discrimination in the workplace by requiring employers to provide the same accommodations for pregnant applicants or employees that it provides to applicants or employees who are not pregnant but have a similar temporary condition that affects their ability to perform their duties.
